info.description: Personal Finance Decision Support System API for managing accounts, transactions, budgets, goals, and investments.
info.title: Personal Finance DSS API

post.description: Create a new financial account for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all accounts for the authenticated user with optional filters
Get a specific account by ID (must belong to authenticated user)

put.description: Update an account for the authenticated user

delete.description: Soft delete an account for the authenticated user

post.description: Run Goal Programming budget allocation model to generate allocation scenarios
Generate conservative, balanced, and aggressive budget allocation scenarios
Run Analytic Hierarchy Process to prioritize financial goals
Change the password of the currently authenticated user
Request a password reset link to be sent to email
Authenticate user with Google OAuth token
Authenticate user with email and password
Logout user by blacklisting their refresh token
Generate a new access token using refresh token from HTTP-only cookie
Register a new user account
Resend verification email to a user email address
Reset password with reset token
Send verification email to current user
Verify user email with verification token

get.description: Get all broker connections for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new broker connection and authenticate with the broker

get.description: Get information about all supported broker providers
Get a specific broker connection by ID

post.description: Activate a broker connection to enable syncing
Deactivate a broker connection to disable syncing
Refresh the access token for a broker connection
Manually trigger a sync for a broker connection
Test if a broker connection is working properly

get.description: Get a list of budget constraints with optional filters

post.description: Create a new budget constraint for a category

get.description: Get budget constraint for a specific category
Get summary of all budget constraints including total mandatory expenses
Get detailed information about a specific budget constraint
Get all budgets for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new budget for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all active budgets for the authenticated user

post.description: Recalculate spent amounts for all user budgets

get.description: Get a summary of budget performance for the authenticated user
Get a specific budget by its ID

post.description: Recalculate spent amount for a budget

get.description: Get a list of categories with optional filters

post.description: Create a new transaction category

get.description: Get a hierarchical tree of categories with their children
Get detailed information about a specific category
Get transaction statistics for a specific category
Get all debts for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new debt for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all active debts for the authenticated user
Get all paid off debts for the authenticated user
Get a summary of all debts for the authenticated user
Get a specific debt by its ID

post.description: Mark a debt as paid off
Add a payment amount to a debt

get.description: Get all goals for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new financial goal for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all active goals for the authenticated user
Get all completed goals for the authenticated user
Get a summary of all goals for the authenticated user
Get a specific goal by its ID

post.description: Mark a goal as completed
Add a contribution amount to a goal

get.description: Get a list of income profiles with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by status (active, pending, ended, archived, paused)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Create a new income profile with source, amount, frequency, and period

get.description: Get all currently active income profiles for the user
Get all archived income profiles for the user

post.description: Automatically check and archive income profiles that have reached their end date

get.description: Get all recurring income profiles for the user
Get detailed information about a specific income profile

put.description: Update an income profile by creating a new version and archiving the old one
put.summary: Update an income profile (creates new version)

post.description: Manually archive an income profile
Update DSS (Decision Support System) analysis metadata for an income profile

get.description: Get income profile with all its version history

post.description: Mark an income profile as verified (user confirmed actual receipt)

get.description: Get a paginated list of investment assets with optional filters
Get all assets of a specific type

post.description: Update prices for multiple assets at once

get.description: Get an overview of the entire investment portfolio
Get all assets on the watchlist
Get detailed information about a specific investment asset
Get a paginated list of portfolio snapshots

post.description: Create a new portfolio snapshot

get.description: Get the most recent portfolio snapshot
Get portfolio performance metrics over a time period
Get snapshots for a specific period (daily, weekly, monthly)
Get detailed information about a specific portfolio snapshot
Get a paginated list of investment transactions with optional filters
Get all transactions for a specific asset
Get aggregate information about investment transactions
Get detailed information about a specific investment transaction
Get all notification preferences for authenticated user

post.description: Create or update notification preference for a specific type

get.description: Get notification preference for a specific type
Get paginated list of notifications for authenticated user

put.description: Mark all unread notifications as read for authenticated user

get.description: Get count of unread notifications for authenticated user
Get a single notification by ID for authenticated user

put.description: Mark a single notification as read for authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile

put.description: Update profile details of the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of transactions with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by instrument (CASH, BANK_ACCOUNT, E_WALLET, etc.)
parameters.name: instrument

parameters.description: Search in description, userNote, counterparty name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Sort by field (booking_date, value_date, amount, created_at)
parameters.name: sortBy

post.description: Create a new financial transaction with direction (DEBIT/CREDIT), instrument type, and source
Import transactions from bank JSON export and automatically sync account balance

get.description: Get aggregate information about transactions with breakdowns by direction, instrument, and source
Get detailed information about a specific transaction
Get a paginated list of user

patch.description: Reinstate a suspended user by ID
Change the role of a user by ID

get.description: Get details of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update details of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Establish WebSocket connection to receive real-time notifications
Get current WebSocket service statistics

post.description: Send a message and get AI response
Send a message and receive streaming AI response via SSE
post.summary: Send a chat message with streaming response

get.description: Get user's conversation history
Get a specific conversation with messages

use_all_scenarios.description: If true, return all 3 scenarios; false returns only balanced

override_income.description: Optional: override income instead of using IncomeProfile

analyze_goal_priority.description: Analyze impact of goal priority changes

high_risk_debts.description: Debts most affected by rate changes

income_break_even_point.description: Income at which allocation becomes infeasible

value.description: A quan trng hn B bao nhiu (1-9)

alternative_comparisons.description: Key = CriteriaID, Value = comparisons ca alternatives theo criteria

alternatives.description: Alternatives (Goals) v comparisons cho tng criterion

criteria.description: Criteria v pairwise comparisons gia criteria

alternative_priorities.description:
Global priorities ca alternatives (kt qu cui cng)
Key = AlternativeID, Value = Global priority weight

local_priorities.description:
Local priorities ca alternatives cho tng criterion
First key = CriteriaID, Second key = AlternativeID, Value = Local priority

amount.description: Amount (in smallest currency unit, e.g., VND = dong)

bankCode.description: Bank-specific fields (optional, mainly for BANK_API or imports)

runningBalance.description: Running balance after transaction (optional, usually from bank)

valueDate.description: If not provided, defaults to BookingDate

accountId.description: Core transaction fields (all optional for updates)

token_expires_at.description: Token info (NOT sensitive values, just metadata)

auto_sync.description: Sync settings (optional, defaults will be applied)

BearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
